text: The 2002 Asian Games, also known as the XIV Asian Games, was a sports event in Busan, South Korea. It occurred from 29 September to 14 October, 2002. There were 419 events from 38 sports and disciplines. ==References== Category:2002 in South Korea Category:2002 in Asia Category:2002 in sports Category:Sport in South Korea Category:Busan Category:Asian Games by year
title: 2002 Asian Games
